meta.name: viewport
meta.title: News from the Superintendent of schools

div.style: display: none; font-size: 1px; color: transparent; line-height: 1px; max-height: 0px; max-width: 0px; opacity: 0; overflow: hidden;
div.span: Closure extended, Teacher Appreciation Week launched.

td.style: padding: 15px 5px;
background-color: #869198; padding: 10px;
background-color: #ffffff; padding: 0;
font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; color: #403F42; text-align: left; display: block; word-wrap: break-word; line-height: 1.2; padding: 10px 20px;

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-weight: bold;

div.span: Continue deplazándose hacia abajo para ver la versión en español.

td.style: background-color: #869198;
font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; color: #FFFFFF; text-align: center; display: block; word-wrap: break-word; line-height: 1.2; padding: 10px 20px;

span.style: font-size: 14px; font-weight: bold;

div.span: Volume 57 | April 6, 2020

td.style: padding-top: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px;
background-color: rgb(92, 55, 146);
font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; color: #FFFFFF; text-decoration: none; padding: 10px 20px;
font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; color: #FFFFFF; text-decoration: none; padding: 0px;

table.style: background-color: rgb(92, 55, 146); width: initial; border-spacing: 0; min-width: initial; padding: 0; border: none;

td.style: font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; color: #FFFFFF; text-decoration: none; padding: 9px 15px 10px;

a.style: color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-size: 18px; font-weight: bold; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; text-decoration: none;

td.style: font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; color: #403F42; text-align: left; display: block; word-wrap: break-word; line-height: 1.2; padding: 10px 20px;

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

div.span: Dear parents and guardians,

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

div.span: We are excited today to launch our special

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-weight: bold; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

div.span: Teacher Appreciation Week

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;
font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

div.span: As Gov. Andrew Cuomo has just announced that

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-weight: bold;

div.span: school closures are extended through April 29

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

div.span: – and we believe the closure is likely to last longer still – it is important to recognize the vital work teachers are doing to support our Distance Learning Plan.

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

div.span: The timing is appropriate. We will soon reveal our

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-style: italic;

div.span: Distance Learning Plan 2.0

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

div.span: , an exciting and rigorous program designed to cover the extended duration of school closings, which we had anticipated. Our teachers are integrally involved in modifying lessons and units to ensure this plan’s continued effectiveness. We look forward to sharing our ever-evolving plan with the community soon.

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;
font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

div.span: Teachers are also thinking of creative ways to ensure that

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-weight: bold;

div.span: students are graded fairly, equitably and accurately

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

div.span: . As you know, the district opted to implement the third-quarter pass-or-incomplete option as a placeholder for secondary schools. Temporarily, teachers will attribute a “P” for passing or an “I” for incomplete. As teachers and school leaders work around the clock to help the district launch the improved Distance Learning Plan, we are making it a priority to devote the time and thoughtfulness required to ensure that ultimately, numeric grades will be properly attributed to students.

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

div.span: This is especially true in light of recent news that

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-weight: bold;

div.span: Regents Exams will be canceled

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

div.span: . We are working thorough grading guidance for teachers to be able to replace the “P” and “I” for the third-quarter with a numeric grade. We are also committed to ensuring that numeric grades are attributed to the fourth quarter and that students have final numeric grades on their transcripts.

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;
font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

div.span: Our teachers are the backbone of distance learning and we are very grateful to them. Teacher Appreciation Week is a wonderful time to focus on the great work that they are doing and the important changes that we will be implementing. Every day this week we will feature a

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-weight: bold;

div.span: Teachers’ Corner

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

div.span: where we will present short videos that inspire educators. Mr. Anthony Stirpe, one of our PAVE teachers at the high school and a distinguished educator working with Apple Education, has been creating and collaborating with Apple to create these wonderful videos. Today, for the first day, we will share two videos on empathetic teaching.

a.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal; text-decoration: underline;

div.a: Here is a teacher talk (16 minutes)

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

div.span: and a

a.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal; text-decoration: underline;

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;
font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

div.span: Every day this week we will share one new video. Enjoy!

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

div.span: Sincerely,

td.style: padding: 0px 20px;
font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; color: #403F42; text-align: left; display: block; word-wrap: break-word; line-height: 1.2; padding: 10px 20px;

span.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

div.span: Sincerely,

span.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

div.span: Dr. Laura Feijóo

span.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

div.span: Superintendent

td.style: padding-top: 10px; padding-bottom: 10px;
font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; color: #403F42; text-align: left; display: block; word-wrap: break-word; line-height: 1.2; padding: 10px 20px;

span.style: font-size: 14px;

div.span: Video: The Empathetic Educator

td.style: padding: 9px 0px;
padding-bottom: 0px; border-bottom-style: none; height: 1px; line-height: 1px; background-color: #869198;
background-color: rgb(92, 55, 146);
padding-top: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px;
background-color: rgb(92, 55, 146);

table.style: background-color: rgb(92, 55, 146); width: initial; border-spacing: 0; min-width: initial; padding: 0; border: none;

td.style: font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; color: #FFFFFF; text-decoration: none; padding: 9px 15px 10px;

a.style: color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-size: 18px; font-weight: bold; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; text-decoration: none;

div.a: Abrazando la diversidad. Conduciendo al éxito

td.style: font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; color: #403F42; text-align: left; display: block; word-wrap: break-word; line-height: 1.2; padding: 10px 20px;

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

div.span: Queridos padres y guardianes,

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

div.span: Hoy estamos emocionados de lanzar nuestra especial

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-weight: bold;

div.span: Semana Agradecimiento a los Maestros

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;
font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

div.span: Como el gobernador Andrew Cuomo acaba de anunciar que

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-weight: bold;

div.span: el cierre de las escuelas se extenderá hasta el 29 de abril

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

div.span: , y creemos que es probable que el cierre dure aún más, es importante reconocer el trabajo vital que los maestros están haciendo para apoyar nuestro Plan de aprendizaje a distancia.

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

div.span: El momento es apropiado. Pronto revelaremos nuestro Plan de

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-style: italic;

div.span: aprendizaje a distancia 2.0

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

div.span: , un programa emocionante y riguroso diseñado para cubrir la duración prolongada del cierre de las escuelas, que habíamos previsto. Nuestros maestros participan integralmente en la modificación de lecciones y unidades para garantizar la efectividad continua de este plan. Esperamos compartir pronto nuestro plan en constante evolución con la comunidad.

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;
font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

div.span: Los maestros también están pensando en formas creativas para garantizar que

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-weight: bold;

div.span: los estudiantes sean calificados de manera justa, equitativa y precisa.

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

div.span: Como saben, el distrito optó por implementar la opción de aprobar o completar el tercer trimestre como marcador de posición para las escuelas secundarias. Temporalmente, los maestros atribuirán una "P" por aprobar o una "I" por incompleta. A medida que los maestros y los líderes escolares trabajan las 24 horas del día para ayudar al distrito a lanzar el Plan de aprendizaje a distancia mejorado, estamos haciendo una prioridad dedicar el tiempo y la consideración necesarios para garantizar que, en última instancia, las calificaciones numéricas se atribuyan adecuadamente a los estudiantes.

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

div.span: Esto es especialmente cierto a la luz de las noticias recientes de que

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-weight: bold;

div.span: los exámenes Regents serán cancelados.

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

div.span: Estamos trabajando en una guía de calificación exhaustiva para que los maestros puedan reemplazar la "P" y la "I" para el tercer trimestre con una calificación numérica. También nos comprometemos a garantizar que las calificaciones numéricas se atribuyan al cuarto trimestre y que los estudiantes tengan calificaciones numéricas finales en sus transcripciones.

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;
font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

div.span: Nuestros maestros son la columna vertebral del aprendizaje a distancia y les estamos muy agradecidos. La Semana de Apreciación de los Maestros es un momento maravilloso para concentrarse en el gran trabajo que están haciendo y los cambios importantes que implementaremos. Todos los días de esta semana presentaremos un

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-weight: bold;

div.span: Rincón de Maestros

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

div.span: donde presentaremos videos cortos que inspirarán a los educadores. El Sr. Anthony Stirpe, uno de nuestros maestros de PAVE en la escuela secundaria y un distinguido educador que trabaja con Apple Education, ha estado creando y colaborando con Apple para crear estos maravillosos videos. Hoy, durante el primer día, compartiremos dos videos sobre la enseñanza empática. Aquí hay una

a.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal; text-decoration: underline;

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

div.span: y una

a.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal; text-decoration: underline;

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;
font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

div.span: Todos los días de esta semana compartiremos un nuevo video. ¡Disfrutar!

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

div.span: Sinceramente,
